text: , son of Fusatsugu, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Muromachi period (1336–1573). He held a regent position kampaku from 1479 to 1483. Konoe Hisamichi was his son. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1445 births Category:1505 deaths
title: Konoe Masaie
